original_title: Wild Man Oliver: The Complete First Season
overview: When a pandemic outbreak cancels your plans to go camping with friends, you go camping anyway... in your own backyard.  A spinoff of the Waste Of Time Podcast series, Wild Man Oliver follows podcast host Oliver Giles as he attempts to stave off boredom during the COVID-19 lockdown by spending several months outside in a tent.  Filmed between May 2020 and July 2022, this supercut combines all five episodes of Season 1 together into one video, including the beach hiking special.
tagline: When COVID kills the fun, there's only one thing to do... go camping in your own back yard!
title: Wild Man Oliver: The Complete First Season
